vulnerability.name: USN-7113-1
vulnerability.description: Several security issues were discovered in the WebKitGTK Web and JavaScript engines. If a user were tricked into viewing a malicious website, a remote attacker could exploit a variety of issues related to web browser security, including cross-site scripting attacks, denial of service attacks, and arbitrary code execution.

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in WebKitGTK.
